text: Vitré is a city in the east of Brittany, France. Its name in the Breton language is and Gallo is Vitræ. It has about 18,000 people. There are medieval streets, castles, churches, chapels and parks. It is a good example for a city of the Middle Ages. == Gallery == Image:Centre historique.JPG|View of Vitré Image:Castle-Vitre-France5.jpg|Castle of Vitré Image:Église Notre-Dame Vitré.JPG|Notre-Dame Church == Other websites == * Town Hall and information about Vitré * Country of Vitré * Vitré travel information at Wikivoyage Category:Communes in Ille-et-Vilaine
title: Vitré
